'''Beta 1.16.210.55''' is the fifth beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.210]], released on January 13, 2021,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360055393071|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.16.210.55 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=January 13, 2021}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
'''Stability and Performance '''
* Fixed a crash that could occur when changing language settings.

'''General '''
* Fixed an issue that was causing the Ender Dragon animation to appear jittery ({{bug|MCPE-105892}}). 
* Fixed a bug that prevented Actors from initializing their animation component.</onlyinclude>
